Title: Hello, Bandit
Plot: Dexter tries to focus on the children and fight his dark urges; Debra ends up on Quinn's doorstep.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Shawn Hatosy, April L. Hernandez, Preston Bailey, Rick Peters, Adam Harrington, Gino Montesinos, Marty Ryan
